itinerary.user_prompt:
Plan a trip with the following preferences:

Destination: Tokyo
Duration: 2
Group size: 2
Travel style: Adventure & Outdoor Activities
Budget: Medium Budget (Comfortable spending)
Accommodation preference: Resorts

Please produce:
1) An ItineraryResponse JSON,
2) Then a short summary (â‰¤150 words).
itinerary.ai_response:
```json
{
  "trip_name": "Tokyo Adventure",
  "trip_summary": "A 2-day adventure in Tokyo, focusing on outdoor activities and cultural experiences. Enjoy parks, gardens, and unique attractions.",
  "days": [
    {
      "day": 1,
      "date": "2024-07-20",
      "activities": [
        {
          "name": "Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden",
          "description": "Start your day with a visit to Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, a beautiful park with diverse garden styles. Enjoy a relaxing walk and explore the serene landscapes. (Allow 2-3 hours)",
          "lat": 35.685277,
          "lng": 139.710278,
          "travel_time": "0 min",
          "type": "attraction"
        },
        {
          "name": "Meiji Jingu Shrine",
          "description": "Next, head to Meiji Jingu Shrine, a peaceful oasis dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken. Take a stroll through the forest and experience a traditional Shinto shrine. (Allow 1.5-2.5 hours)",
          "lat": 35.675351,
          "lng": 139.702279,
          "travel_time": "20 min",
          "type": "attraction"
        },
        {
          "name": "Harajuku Street",
          "description": "Explore the vibrant Harajuku Street, known for its unique fashion and street food. Try some local snacks and enjoy the energetic atmosphere. (Allow 1-2 hours)",
          "lat": 35.670353,
          "lng": 139.70284,
          "travel_time": "10 min",
          "type": "attraction"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dinner at Han no Daidokoro Bettei",
          "description": "Enjoy dinner at Han no Daidokoro Bettei, a restaurant known for its high-quality Wagyu beef and traditional Japanese dishes.",
          "lat": 35.665444,
          "lng": 139.706421,
          "travel_time": "15 min",
          "type": "restaurant"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "day": 2,
      "date": "2024-07-21",
      "activities": [
        {
          "name": "Ueno Park",
          "description": "Visit Ueno Park, a large public park that houses several museums, a zoo, and a beautiful pond. Explore the park and choose a museum to visit based on your interests. (Allow 3-4 hours)",
          "lat": 35.71403,
          "lng": 139.77529,
          "travel_time": "0 min",
          "type": "attraction"
        },
        {
          "name": "Senso-ji Temple",
          "description": "Head to Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo's oldest temple, and explore the Nakamise-dori market leading up to the temple. Experience the traditional atmosphere and enjoy the local crafts and snacks. (Allow 2-3 hours)",
          "lat": 35.714583,
          "lng": 139.796667,
          "travel_time": "30 min",
          "type": "attraction"
        },
        {
          "name": "Tokyo Skytree",
          "description": "Visit the Tokyo Skytree for panoramic views of the city. Enjoy the observation decks and explore the surrounding shopping and dining options. (Allow 2-3 hours)",
          "lat": 35.710086,
          "lng": 139.810705,
          "travel_time": "20 min",
          "type": "attraction"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dinner at Gonpachi Nishi-Azabu",
          "description": "Enjoy dinner at Gonpachi Nishi-Azabu, a restaurant known for its traditional Japanese cuisine and ambiance, inspired by the movie Kill Bill.",
          "lat": 35.657778,
          "lng": 139.722222,
          "travel_time": "40 min",
          "type": "restaurant"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
Summary:

This 2-day Tokyo adventure balances outdoor activities with cultural immersion, perfect for a pair seeking exploration. Day 1 features Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, Meiji Jingu Shrine, and the vibrant Harajuku Street, capped off with a Wagyu dinner. Day 2 includes Ueno Park, Senso-ji Temple, and panoramic views from Tokyo Skytree, ending with dinner at the iconic Gonpachi Nishi-Azabu. Travel times between locations are estimated between 10-40 minutes. Consider purchasing a Suica or Pasmo card for easy public transport. For accommodation, look for resorts in Shinjuku or near Ueno Park.
